section.p: Create the following chart. Make the layout as similar as possible.
section.note: First, create two columns in a worksheet with values for X and calculated values for Y. Create a scatter chart and apply the formatting.

section.title: Solution
section.p: Create first a table with two columns for the X and Y values. The X-value range ​​is from -1 to +2 with an increment of 0.1. The Y-values ​​must be calculated using the formula = (X -0,5)^3.
Create a scatter chart and format it.
